Providers

Logger(verbose)

Event logger class.

Logger.show(message)

Log the event based on Message class.

MessageService()

Message Service class.

MessageService.load_messages()

Set messages.

MessageService.msg(name[, extra])

Read a message.

RepoProvider()

RepoProvider class.

RepoProvider.init(repo_name, items)

Initialize a new repository.

RepoProvider._git_add(repo, items)

Initialize a new repository.

RepoProvider._git_commit(repo)

Initialize a new repository.

RepoProvider._git_init(repo_dir)

Initialize a new repository.
